magic_words: Extract keywords and synonyms from the SEO summariser document which are likely to have the highest traffic for the user's product list (preference keywords and synonyms with 2 or fewer words). Avoid any keywords which are related to a job description. Return a comma separated list of 10 keywords or synonyms trying to select for a variety of their different products.
